I needed these for an event, there was no Plan B! The heel area was tight, straight with no Curve for your foot/heel. Therefore I was unable to zip up even though they fit in size. (i size my heels UP to a 9 instead of the 8.5 I wear in other shoes)  THE FIX: a blow dryer to the back heel/zipper, for about 3min. Then with thick socks put them on before they cooled down. It worked!  Wore them all night, with no issue comfortably ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Love the Lagerfeld boots I bought two pair. One with the big pearls too. I wore these with a Saphire super wide n high waisted ball gown that's shorter in front than back which show cases these boots and according to my daughter bride I look "straight off the runway"! Wore with black tights to keep a uniform black look but the peep toe is well placed and causes zero discomfort. The rubber tire tread sole under the foot ball means no sore feet and cushions my foot all night. I have balance issues and although these are high heels I had zero tippy or balancing issues and could walk and dance as I normally do. Very sharp boot and they work with everything from a ball gown to destroyed jeans :)
